publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4421 Michael Russell: The Energy, Commitment and Creativity of Scotland’s Festivals and their Contribution to the Financial Success and Quality of Life in Scotland—That the Parliament recognises the international success of the Edinburgh festivals, along with Scotland’s other festivals, their contribution to the Scottish economy, their role in the cultural life of the nation and the positive messages that they promote about Scotland’s cultural confidence and ambition in this Year of Homecoming. Supported by: Bruce Crawford*
